author: Brian Turner
method: Divide the pork, prunes, peppers and water chestnuts into two batches. Thread them alternately onto bamboo skewers and place in a high sided plate. Mix the honey with the soy sauce. Pour over the skewers and marinate for at least ten minutes. Heat a frying pan, add a tablespoon of olive oil and cook the skewers for eight to ten minutes, turning so that they are evenly coloured on all sides and cooked throughout. Transfer to a dish and serve warm.
ingredients: 200g/7oz pork fillet, cubed,  4 prunes,  Â½red pepper, cut into 6 chunks,  4 water chestnuts,  1 tbsp honey,  2 tbsp soy sauce,  olive oil,  2 bamboo skewers, soaked in water
